reviewText: The dance troupe "Mazowsze" does a wonderful performance in Russia of folk dancing and songs from various regions of Poland.  Their energy and perfection in performing is incredible! I have always enjoyed seeing the "Cossack style" dancing with men doing leaps that defy the imagination.  If you enjoy traditional folk dancing and singing, this should make you a "happy camper".  The only negative is rather dim lighting at times making it somewhat difficult to see exactly what is going on.
